markdownRemark.html:
Hello, I am web & mobile developer based in Tbilisi, Georgia. I love photography, music and films.

Programing Skills:

  • Back-end: Nodejs, PHP (Frameworks: Laravel)
  • Front-end: React (Redux), VueJS
  • Mobile: React Native (Expo.io)
  • Databases: MongoDB, PostgresSQL, Oracle, MySQL
  • Cross-platform: Github Electron, Nw.js

Good knowledge of Nginx, Ubuntu servers

Also have experience with Socket.Io

frontmatter.title: English to Georgian dictionary for Kindle devices
